SEARCH
Module webfx.stack.ui.action
Package dev.webfx.stack.ui.action.impl

Class WritableAction

java.lang.Object
dev.webfx.stack.ui.action.impl.ReadOnlyAction
dev.webfx.stack.ui.action.impl.WritableAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Action, EventListener, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent>
Direct Known Subclasses:
OperationAction
public class WritableAction extends ReadOnlyAction
A writable action where properties (text, graphic, disabled, visible) can be set later (ie after constructor call) either by calling the setters or by binding these properties (ex: writableTextProperty().bind(myTextProperty))
Author:
Bruno Salmon
